item.title: spring-summer 2021
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.description: end of undergrad and feeling like the end is in sight
item.content:encoded: spring dogwoods wish petals sending warm love &ndash; ambient footsteps first crop &ndash; gradually startles a Conscience dreams of farms and glory sweaty sinews; love’s rhythm two days in a row battle, good and evil no grey in community past shame some how withers I harden will I ever be enough? first world problem is privilege knowing life ends well how long? my child trains dimensions filtered &hellip; unfiltered filter summer dogwood blooms &ndash; loving each other, overflowing the edge of the pond residential concrete crow caws to robin unfenced front yard words light the gas doubt billows from the subcortex &ndash; gloom sizzles inside cloudy waves their turbulent serenity reflecting lifetime serotonin spurs inspiration &hellip; for sunburnt shoulders Haiku summer &ndash; Reading poet’s names A big world building your own website = pure ontology atop a slant there is the hospital storm &hellip; pending binary songbird : leaps from signpost to branch on leeward gust city’s peace : my father’s infinite chagrin vanishes phone eats first the simple dishes are rarely bland ball moss&hellip; between my fingertips springs trickle image search is mother of us all &ndash; in a desolate scape heat in the shade &ndash; cocktail opposed to coffee shunning me again pixel rain falling to a dubstep beat L, L L hacking away at wood and python also my forehead poems are my spells cast away free chilly morning dew : shapes the river valley crescent of clouds summer eve &ndash; together on the wood the taste of sambal warmth of coffee at the Korean market a heartfelt friend

item.title: winter 2020-2021
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: quiet and rainy windows are closed, but listen world solitude devotion &ndash; sun that invites you upon inspection seated on winter grass &ndash; computer juxtaposed for final studies this is a coup trump = white supremacy is domestic terrorism carbonation, sip the popping bubbles winter rainfall snow not sticking &ndash; a son honors his father claiming his mantle screen replays gaming loops before me day lost to clouds watching romances traces of myself in every lip’s furl surprise, my kidneys! who knows what occurs beneath skin tree in the wind just so happy to be here bright clouds, cold blue : dark window opened growth of epochs cold inspection for the cold veggie harvest &ndash; in warm clothes the repeat burglar saunters through those aisles again

item.title: fall-2020
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.description: we were alive, but really we were dead
item.content:encoded: swordsmen sing among equinox flowers a fawn forages specter sets a trap around corners grow shadows no moon in skull town scale, fearless that spiny slope, unbowed hand pyramid, firm walking faster by cutting corners of acute sidewalks swollen with sugar lazy day leaves strange aftertaste an inside moral war how to write haiku without ever stepping outside I ran so far away the big hungry winter cuddle then devour upend my dirty growl behind my angry howl warm hearth filled with stronger fire &ndash; hope in overcast skies little in this world decided by one person too much is

item.title: spring-summer 2020 **BEST PHOTOS IMHO**
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: spring gods falling from the sky &ndash; water rushes spring mother : carried bags of groceries her sun babies my spirit animal found his heavenly rest : the spring robin the green samurai &ndash; nears me with day light and his stone summer equivocation : to some I’m “weird,” or even “cool” those words mean nothing

item.title: fall-winter 2019
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall subjects follow as queen bows her head &ndash; almost winter&rsquo;s turn flock of ducks survey centennial waters sun bids the cold

item.title: spring-summer 2019
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.description: a year into in my relationship with Parker
item.content:encoded: spring spring’s robins &ndash; seeding the university soil my heart! raw bloom &ndash; the stately robin careens chapter ends because nobody seems to remember what happened a sharp edge just begging to make a cut. the cold hurts summer the wildfire &ndash; rays leave skin red and irradiated you have commitment lacking in dialogue : or so he said slithering sweat weaves from tree to tree : spotted light lone zinnia against the mad king he stands so tall

item.title: fall-winter 2018
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: fall to her autumn means outside ball is everything grey room fits dying leaves, not how he feels winter before happened two fraternal hounds &ndash; dry yard grass no order in time&rsquo;s quanta next does not exist

item.title: spring-summer 2018
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.description: first-year at Vandy, early in my relationship with Parker
item.content:encoded: spring fatalidade -- pelo pecado puro e decepção verde fatality -- by the pure sin and green deception urbano crescimento -- humano cidades construídos em cima de outras urban development -- human cities built on others summer window beams &ndash; eggs rest on rice caving in My chest crumbles with anxiety Waiting to board their flight

item.title: kū português
item.dc:creator: Zach Stoebner
item.content:encoded: dia quente, raro -- surpreedente em Cascais que não atrevem nadar rare, hot day -- surprising in Cascais that they don't dare swim champô aguado passo do pente pelo cabelo e chove bate a janela watery shampoo comb passes through hair and rain batters the window ondas do Tejo relaxam-me nas costas -- ventos até inverno waves of the Tejo relax me on my back -- winds to winter ventos frios acima : metais bem empregados atrás da faixa amarela cold winds above : well-employed metals behind the yellow line fumo aqui escrito no prédio : nuvens em tudo smoke here written on the building : clouds everywhere bebo do tinto enquanto olho ao branco -- Camões vacia I drink from red while looking at white -- empty Camões porém ao ver o pássaro procura na telha cinzas but upon seeing the bird search on grey tiles táxi busca gajo taxi pick up guy café tenho de o derrotar -- a primavera já coffee I have to defeat it -- spring now medusa azul nade à casa inverno vem blue jellyfish may swim home winter comes Press play below for the "medusa azul" gif!
